channel.title: Larry Ellison on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Larry Ellison on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Dan Rather Warns Paramount Buying Warner Bros. Discovery “Would Change CNN Forever”
item.description: We “have to be concerned about the consolidation of huge billionaires getting control of nearly all of the major news outlets,” the former ‘CBS Evening News’ anchor said.

item.title: OpenAI and partners are building a massive AI data center in Texas
item.description: “Easy to throw around numbers, but this is a gigantic infrastructure project.”
